name: Class TaskEvent
text: Provides details about work that has been done by the JDK Java Compiler, javac.
codes:
public final class TaskEvent
extends Object

methods.description: Returns the kind for this event.

Returns the source file for this event.
 May be null.

Returns the compilation unit for this event.
 May be null.

Returns the type element for this event.
 May be null.
